channel.title: New server zapscape.no-ip.biz p.s. 2questions
channel.description: There is new server creating. ip: zapscape.no-ip.biz p.s. 2questions:1: how to make equipments?when u create new char its get robes,armors or something . 2: how to set commands or commands in emotes? wery need ur help thx :o

item.title: New server zapscape.no-ip.biz p.s. 2questions
item.dc:creator: @the_zap the zap
item.description:
@the_zap wrote:

[quote=“sarge2050, post:3, topic:119278”]answer to 1.

go to player.java >- search (ctrl+f) playerEquipment[playerHat]= >- change the numbers after to the id that you want then do the rest for the playerEquipment[playerCape]= , playerEquipment[playerAmulet]= , playerEquipment[playerChest]= , playerEquipment[playerShield]= , playerEquipment[playerLegs]= , playerEquipment[playerHands]= , playerEquipment[playerFeet]= , playerEquipment[playerRing]= , playerEquipment[playerArrows]= , playerEquipment[playerWeapon]= . if you want the new char to start with nothing on an item put the id number to -1 and make sure there is a ; at the end of each line[br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2007, 11:01:45 PM[/size][hr]for number 2 let me get this straight so i know how to find out the answer, you want to make one of your emotes do a command?[/quote]

for 1 answer: i do that and do compile but its not efecting on server ;[
fior 2 naswer: yes[br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2007, 09:01:00 AM[/size][hr][quote=“rickyrick, post:2, topic:119278”]2: look in downloads section and download the kit in one of the threads and you have a command maker![/quote]

where to find that “downloads” section? ;p[br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2007, 09:11:51 AM[/size][hr]p.s. need help with npcdrops. i done all drops but its not effecting the server.

Read full topic

item.title: New server zapscape.no-ip.biz p.s. 2questions
item.dc:creator: @sarge2050 sarge2050
item.description:
@sarge2050 wrote:

answer to 1.

go to player.java >- search (ctrl+f) playerEquipment[playerHat]= >- change the numbers after to the id that you want then do the rest for the playerEquipment[playerCape]= , playerEquipment[playerAmulet]= , playerEquipment[playerChest]= , playerEquipment[playerShield]= , playerEquipment[playerLegs]= , playerEquipment[playerHands]= , playerEquipment[playerFeet]= , playerEquipment[playerRing]= , playerEquipment[playerArrows]= , playerEquipment[playerWeapon]= . if you want the new char to start with nothing on an item put the id number to -1 and make sure there is a ; at the end of each line[br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2007, 11:01:45 PM[/size][hr]for number 2 let me get this straight so i know how to find out the answer, you want to make one of your emotes do a command?

Read full topic
